Creating a new construct via sequence selection

12 months ago

The following explains how to add a construct to a construct designer window using the sequence selection feature of the protein sequence editor. Once you have selected the start / stop positions using this feature you will then need to follow the instructions here to complete creating your new construct.

Step Preview
1.Load the entry clone translation
(to add entry clones follow these instructions)
Entry clone translation
2. Select region of interest and right-click and select Add to plate->New Plate
If you already have a construct designer windows open these will show up as additional options in the Add to plate menu. Remember that you can rename a construct designer window by right-clicking on it in the workspace tree
3. Construct added to plate
